Burlington.Burlington\u2013Alamance Regional Airpor: Burlington–Alamance Regional Airport (ICAO: KBUY, FAA LID: BUY) is a public use airport in Alamance County, North Carolina, United States. It located three nautical miles (6 km) southwest of the central business district of Burlington, North Carolina and is owned by the Burlington–Alamance Airport Authority. This airport is included in the National Plan of Integrated Airport Systems for 2011–2015, which categorized it as a general aviation facility.
